scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && npm run build && cp -r dist ../airfryervault_backend
scripts.deploy:ui: git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push -u origin main
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy:ui && cd ../airfryervault_backend && git add . && git commit -m bebuild && git push -u origin main && cd ../airfryervault_frontend
